cleaned_text: It can be combined with other scents like: lemongrass, sage, rosemary, frankincense, tea tree, sandalwood, chamomile, bergamot and other citrus, coffee, floral, rose, mint, cherry, lemon fruit or other smells of nature. This portable box made of wood is the perfect gift for any person: mother, father, friend, etc. and for any occasion. The mini lotion pack is suitable for men and women. For your beauty: maintains elastic and young skin, hair revive wax and good perfume smell. Can be applied also after germ hand sanitizer. With our natural aroma blossom now you can give to your body the desired soul food, relaxation and to relief the mind and enhance your aura. The therapeutic products can be applied during your yoga, meditation, massage or just relaxing and calming with burning candles. Our plant sets help against stress, anxiety, depression, headache, mind purification, making scented therapy you can breathe and sleep deep using this alternative medicine. The essentials are best used for: your home care(bedroom, bath, toilet, art wall in your living room), house, car, spa. Very good starter for beginners and all scent lovers. Easy to use with or without diffusers, humidifiers, air purifier, lamp burner, bracelet, vape, vaporizer or beads. You can mix and combine the blend with aroma candle, soap, bath bomb or other accessories.
